channel.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
channel.description: Here's another free templates guys! Before you use though I would like to just point out that I have already had to threaten 3-4 sites with DMCA takedowns and have taken 1 down already. [spoiler=TakeDown] [img]http://gyazo.com/9561d0d80d0c814b5d4c6f556e018d74.png?1366137798[/img] [/spoiler] Please, all you have to do is keep the linkback to RSPSDesigns in the footer of the template, that is all. To clarify the link back, the minimal allowed linkback is: [code] RSPSDesigns [/code] I don't want to see linkbacks like: Design by: SITENAME & RevengePK! Design by: SITENAME & RSPSDesigns. (I made it, you didn't, your site is copyrighted to you but the designs is copyrighted to me. Refer to the template license included in the download.) With that all done, heres a preview: [img]http://gyazo.com/03403299380b05489811cf2f15b862af.png?1366140323[/img] [url=http://rspsdesigns.com/downloads.php?download=7]Download[/url]

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:516616”]Few points:

[ul][li]HTML resets, strong emphasis on this, research it.[/li]
[li]Deprecated prefixes, there’s no need to have all the individual prefixes for each browser on box-shadow.[/li]
[li]Shorthand properties, just a quick scan through your CSS and I can see quite a few instances where you’ve done things like padding-top, padding-right, and padding-left, just use shorthand padding. And you’ve also got borders on three sides where you’ve listed each side separately, just set it once with border shorthand and then set border: 0 on the side you don’t want there to be a border. Border-radius also has a shorthand property.[/li]
[li]Spacing in your CSS, any need for this? Increases file size a fair amount I’ve found.[/li]
[li]Far too many requests on page load, combine your CSS/Javascript, the more requests your site makes the slower it’s going to load. If you don’t need every single one for every page, what I do is selectively include the ones you need via PHP.[/li]
[li]Tag cloud, I’m sure they’re normally dynamically generated? :P[/li]
[li]Page width, overall website width is too wide, you should either make it fluid/responsive or around the 960 pixel area. I’m afraid a good percentage of the world is still using 1024 wide monitors (minus area for scrolling, therefore your site would not fit).[/li]
[li]You’re using a html5 doctype, why not use the html5 sectioning elements? (, , , etc).[/li][/ul]

Honestly though I’m nit picking and being an ass so do not take it all to heart, but they’re all valid points (I hope!). I think the overall design is absolutely brilliant as are the other templates you’ve been releasing, nice to see some real talent, and I greatly envy your creativity and flair for design, as it’s something I really lack myself. Really well done on your recent work.[/quote]

These are all valid points! Like any other designer, programmer I’m still learning. I will look into the points you have listed! Thanks for the response.

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Few points:

[ul][li]HTML resets, strong emphasis on this, research it.[/li]
[li]Deprecated prefixes, there’s no need to have all the individual prefixes for each browser on box-shadow.[/li]
[li]Shorthand properties, just a quick scan through your CSS and I can see quite a few instances where you’ve done things like padding-top, padding-right, and padding-left, just use shorthand padding. And you’ve also got borders on three sides where you’ve listed each side separately, just set it once with border shorthand and then set border: 0 on the side you don’t want there to be a border. Border-radius also has a shorthand property.[/li]
[li]Spacing in your CSS, any need for this? Increases file size a fair amount I’ve found.[/li]
[li]Far too many requests on page load, combine your CSS/Javascript, the more requests your site makes the slower it’s going to load. If you don’t need every single one for every page, what I do is selectively include the ones you need via PHP.[/li]
[li]Tag cloud, I’m sure they’re normally dynamically generated? :P[/li]
[li]Page width, overall website width is too wide, you should either make it fluid/responsive or around the 960 pixel area. I’m afraid a good percentage of the world is still using 1024 wide monitors (minus area for scrolling, therefore your site would not fit).[/li]
[li]You’re using a html5 doctype, why not use the html5 sectioning elements? (, , , etc).[/li][/ul]

Honestly though I’m nit picking and being an ass so do not take it all to heart, but they’re all valid points (I hope!). I think the overall design is absolutely brilliant as are the other templates you’ve been releasing, nice to see some real talent, and I greatly envy your creativity and flair for design, as it’s something I really lack myself. Really well done on your recent work.

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Soulcist:

That’s the spirit! You really should make a career out of this or something, these templates looks VERY nice.

I do this sometimes for money. I offer custom templates on RSPSDesigns for $50-$80. I do business templates for $150-$350.

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Am I allowed to have this as a linkback? [I’m kidding around haha]
HTML:

<div id="linkbk">
<a href="http://rspsdesigns.com" title="Free Website Templates">RSPSDesigns</a>
</div>

CSS:

#linkbk{
visibility:hidden;
}

I like it, design wise, but I’m not going to use it.

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Ruby:

Looks pretty flawless, there’s only a few things I can pick up on. When using the font-size property you shouldn’t use pixels, you should use ems or percentages. Check out this article for more information. Some html5 wouldn’t go a miss either ;).

Alright, I’ll look into it. Thanks for the feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Looks pretty flawless, there’s only a few things I can pick up on. When using the font-size property you shouldn’t use pixels, you should use ems or percentages. Check out this article for more information. Some html5 wouldn’t go a miss either ;).

Read full topic

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Ruby:

Looks aesthetically pleasing. I’m not big on downloading files I don’t need though, so mind providing some code examples?

Damn, forgot.

CSS:

body {

	margin: 0;
	font-family: 'Oxygen', sans-serif;
	background: #e1e1e1 url(images/bg2.png);
	color: #999;
	font-size: 12px;
	padding-bottom: 20px;
}

a { color: #888; text-decoration: none; }
a:hover { color: #888; text-decoration: underline; }

#topNav {

	background: #222;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
	height: 35px;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

#topNavInner {

	width: 1024px;
	height: 35px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
	line-height: 35px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

#topNavInner ul {

	list-style-type: none;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
}

#topNavInner li {

	display: inline;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
}

#topNavInner li a {

	padding: 12px 8px;
	text-decoration: none;
	color: #999;
	transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	-webkit-transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	-o-transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	font-size: 11px;
	font-weight: bold;
}

#topNavInner li a:hover {

	padding: 12px 8px;
	text-decoration: none;
	color: #fff;
	background: #62c8d7;
	transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	-webkit-transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	-o-transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	font-size: 11px;
	font-weight: bold;
}

#head {

	height: 100px;
	width: 100%;
	background: #1c1c1c url(images/head.jpg) top no-repeat;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.6) inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.6) inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.6) inset;
}

#headInner {

	width: 1024px;
	height: 90px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

#wrapper {

	height: auto;
	width: 1024px;
	margin: 15px auto auto auto;
}

#bread {

	width: 1014px;
	height: 30px;
	background: #eee;
	line-height: 30px;
	padding: 5px;
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 10px auto auto auto;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	border-radius: 3px;
}

a.bread-home {

	background: #62c8d7;
	font-size: 15px;
	padding: 15px;
	margin-left: -5px;
	color: #fff;
	text-shadow: 0 0 5px #222;
	text-decoration: none;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
}

a.bread-home:hover {

	background: #62c8d7;
	font-size: 15px;
	padding: 15px;
	margin-left: -5px;
	color: #fff;
	text-shadow: 0 0 5px #222;
	text-decoration: none;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
}	

#content {

	float: left;
	width: 763px;
	height: auto;
}

#sideBar {

	float: left;
	margin-left: 10px;
	width: 240px;
	height: auto;
}

.clear { clear: both; }

ul.sideBar {

	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	list-style: none;
}

#sideBoxOne1, #sideBoxOne2, #sideBoxOne3 {

    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    background: #fff;
    padding: 5px;
    border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}

h2.sideBoxTitle {
	
	font-size: 11px;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: #999;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #fff;
	margin: 0;
	height: 33px;
	line-height: 33px;
	padding-left: 10px;
	background: #eeeeee;
	width: 100%;
	border-top: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
	border-left: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
	border-right: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}

span.tagOne {

	font-size: 11px;
}

span.tagTwo {

	font-size: 18px;
}

span.tagThree {

	font-size: 25px;
}

#contentBoxOne {

	width: 98%;
	height: auto;
	background: #fff;
	padding: 5px;
	border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}

h2.contentBoxTitle {
	
	font-size: 11px;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: #fff;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000;
	margin: 0;
	height: 33px;
	line-height: 33px;
	padding-left: 10px;
	background: #111 url(images/pattern2.png);
	margin-bottom: 5px;
	width: 750px;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
}

.dotted {

	font-size: 40px;
	text-align: center;
	width: 100%;
}

.section {

	width: 182px;
	height: auto;
	float: left;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-top: -9px;
}

.section2 {

	width: 182px;
	height: auto;
	float: left;
	margin-left: 10px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-top: -9px;
}

h2.sectionTitle {

	font-size: 11px;
	color: #999;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #fff;
	background: #111 url(images/bg.png);
	padding: 5px;
	margin-bottom: 5px;
	border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}

.sectionBody {

	background: #fff;
	width: auto;
	padding: 5px;
	border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
	text-align: center;
}

span.bigIcon {

	color: #999;
	font-size: 55px;
}

span.bigIcon a:hover {

	text-decoration: none;
}

#headInner img {

	margin-top: 25px;
}

#footer {

	margin-top: 10px;
	width: 100%;
	height: 40px;
	background: #eee;
	border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 11px;
	line-height: 40px;
}

img.homeImage {

	height: 80px;
	width: 163px;
	border: 5px solid #f0f0f0;
}
.previews {

	width: 1014px;
	text-align: center;
	margin-top: 5px;
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #d6d6d6;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	padding: 5px;
}

h2.previews {

	font-size: 11px;
	color: #999;
	width: 1014px;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #fff;
	background: #111 url(images/bg.png);
	padding: 5px;
	margin-bottom: 5px;
	border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
	text-align: left;
}

.previews ul {

	list-style: none;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
}


.previews li {

	display: inline;
	padding: 9px;
}

HTML:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<title>GameTown - Free Website Templates</title>
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="screen.css" />
	<link rel="alternate stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen" title="green-version" href="green.css" />
	<link rel="alternate stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen" title="red-version" href="red.css" />
	<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oxygen' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="plugins/font-awesome.css" />
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="plugins/font-awesome.min.css" />
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="plugins/tipsy.css" />
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="flexslider.css" />
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="colorbox.css" />
	<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.9.1.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/jquery.flexslider.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/jquery.colorbox.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/custom.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/tipsy.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/dragndrop.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="plugins/styleswitcher.js"></script>
	<!--[if IE 7]>
	<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="plugins/font-awesome-ie7.css" />
	<![endif]-->
	<script type="text/javascript">
		jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
			jQuery("a").tipsy({gravity: jQuery.fn.tipsy.autoNS, fade: true});
			jQuery('.flexslider').flexslider({
				animation: "fade"
			});
			jQuery(".group1").colorbox({rel:'group1'});
		}); 
	</script>
</head>

<body>
	<div id="topNav">
		<div id="topNavInner">
			<ul>
				<li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
				<li><a href="#">About Us</a></li>
				<li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
				<li><a href="#">Blog</a></li>
				<li><a href="#">Gallery</a></li>
			</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div id="head">
		<div id="headInner">
			<a href="index.html" title="Return To Home"><img src="images/logo.png" alt="Logo" /></a>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div id="bread">
		<a href="index.html" class="bread-home"><i class="icon-home"></i></a>
		<div style="float: right; font-size: 16px; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #fff;">
			<a href="#" title="Follow us on Twitter!"><i class="icon-twitter-sign"></i></a>
			<a href="#" title="Like us on Facebook!"><i class="icon-facebook-sign"></i></a>
			<!---<a href="#" title="Instagram!"><i class="icon-camera-retro"></i></a>
			<a href="#" title="LinkedIn!"><i class="icon-linkedin"></i></a>
			<a href="#" title="GitHub!"><i class="icon-github-sign"></i></a>--->
			<a href="#" title="Google +!"><i class="icon-google-plus-sign"></i></a>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div id="wrapper">
		<div class="flexslider">
			<ul class="slides">
				<li>
					<img src="images/slide.jpg" />
				</li>
				<li>
					<img src="images/slide1.jpg" />
				</li>
				<li>
					<img src="images/slide2.jpg" />
				</li>
				<li>
					<img src="images/slide3.jpg" />
				</li>
			</ul>
	</div>
		<h2 class="previews">Newest Images</h2>
		<div class="previews">
			<ul>
				<li><a class="group1" href="images/bioshock_infinite_2.jpg" title="BioShock Infinite!"><img src="images/bioshock_infinite_2.jpg" class="homeImage" alt="Image" /></a></li>
				<li><a class="group1" href="images/deadspace.jpg" title="Deadspace!"><img src="images/deadspace.jpg" class="homeImage" alt="Image" /></a></li>
				<li><a class="group1" href="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" title="Image will be coming soon!"><img src="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" class="homeImage" alt="Image" /></a></li>
				<li><a class="group1" href="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" title="Image will be coming soon!"><img src="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" class="homeImage" alt="Image" /></a></li>
				<li><a class="group1" href="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" title="Image will be coming soon!"><img src="http://rspsdesigns.com/images/soon.png" class="homeImage" alt="Image" /></a></li>
			</ul>
		</div>
		<div id="content">
			<div class="section">
				<h2 class="sectionTitle">Section</h2>
				<div class="sectionBody">
					<span class="bigIcon"><a href="#" title="An icon title!"><i class="icon-group"></i></a></span><br />
					<span class="sectionBodyAlt">This is a small sectional box to highlight some key features of your site/blog.</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="section2">
				<h2 class="sectionTitle">Section</h2>
				<div class="sectionBody">
					<span class="bigIcon"><a href="#" title="An icon title!"><i class="icon-cloud"></i></a></span><br />
					<span class="sectionBodyAlt">This is a small sectional box to highlight some key features of your site/blog.</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="section2">
				<h2 class="sectionTitle">Section</h2>
				<div class="sectionBody">
					<span class="bigIcon"><a href="#" title="An icon title!"><i class="icon-heart"></i></a></span><br />
					<span class="sectionBodyAlt">This is a small sectional box to highlight some key features of your site/blog.</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="section2">
				<h2 class="sectionTitle">Section</h2>
				<div class="sectionBody">
					<span class="bigIcon"><a href="#" title="An icon title!"><i class="icon-arrow-right"></i></a></span><br />
					<span class="sectionBodyAlt">This is a small sectional box to highlight some key features of your site/blog.</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="clear"></div>
			<h2 class="contentBoxTitle">Some Stupid Content</h2>
			<div id="contentBoxOne">
				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. 				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. 				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</p>
				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</p>
				<div class="clear"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div id="sideBar">
			<ul class="sideBar">
				<li>
					<h2 class="sideBoxTitle">Draggable Sideblock <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="exit1" style="font-size: 11px; float: right; padding-right: 10px;"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i></a></h2>
					<div id="sideBoxOne1">
						This is a pretty cool sideblock. You can arrange them in any order you want! Try dragging this one to the bottom! You can even include <a href="index.html">links</a> within the sideblocks!
					</div>
					<br />
				</li>
				<li>
					<h2 class="sideBoxTitle">Draggable Sideblock <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="exit2" style="font-size: 11px; float: right; padding-right: 10px;"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i></a></h2>
					<div id="sideBoxOne2">
						This is a pretty cool sideblock. You can arrange them in any order you want! Try dragging this one up top!
					</div>
					<br />
				</li>
				<li>
					<h2 class="sideBoxTitle">Tags <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="exit3" style="font-size: 11px; float: right; padding-right: 10px;"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i></a></h2>
					<div id="sideBoxOne3">
						<span class="tagOne"><a href="#">Gaming</a></span>
						<span class="tagTwo"><a href="#">FPS</a></span>
						<span class="tagThree"><a href="#">Hacks</a></span>
						<span class="tagOne"><a href="#">Modding</a></span>
						<span class="tagThree"><a href="#">Ripping</a></span>
						<span class="tagTwo"><a href="#">Zombies</a></span>
						<span class="tagOne"><a href="#">Cheats</a></span>
						<span class="tagTwo"><a href="#">Easter Eggs</a></span>
						<span class="tagThree"><a href="#">Quantum Flex</a></span>
						<span class="tagOne"><a href="#">Modding</a></span>
						<span class="tagThree"><a href="#">RspsDesigns</a></span>
						<span class="tagTwo"><a href="#">Zombies</a></span>
					</div>
					<br />
				</li>
			</ul>
			<input name="list1SortOrder" type="hidden" />
			<script type="text/javascript">
				$(document).ready(function() {
					$("ul.sideBar").dragsort({ dragSelector: "li", dragEnd: function() { }, dragBetween: false, placeHolderTemplate: "<li><div class='dotted'><i class='icon-screenshot'></i></div></li>"});
				});
			</script>
		</div>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div id="footer">
			<strong>Design by: <a href="http://rspsdesigns.com">RSPSDesigns</a></strong> <a href="#">Your Site</a> © 2099.
		</div>
	</div>
</body>
</html>

item.title: GamingTown - Free Website Templates
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Here’s another free templates guys! Before you use though I would like to just point out that I have already had to threaten 3-4 sites with DMCA takedowns and have taken 1 down already.

[spoiler=TakeDown]

9561d0d80d0c814b5d4c6f556e018d74.png?1366137798531×617

[/spoiler]

Please, all you have to do is keep the linkback to RSPSDesigns in the footer of the template, that is all. To clarify the link back, the minimal allowed linkback is:

<a href="http://rspsdesigns.com" title="Free Website Templates">RSPSDesigns</a>

I don’t want to see linkbacks like:

Design by: SITENAME & RevengePK!

Design by: SITENAME & RSPSDesigns.

(I made it, you didn’t, your site is copyrighted to you but the designs is copyrighted to me. Refer to the template license included in the download.)

With that all done, heres a preview:

03403299380b05489811cf2f15b862af.png?13661403231164×664

Download

Read full topic
